channel.title: Java 6 update 14 (Help please)
channel.description: ok well ive been reading some tutorials on setting up java but there thing is for ;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin;. 6 update 10 or something... but mines 6 update 14, can anyone please tell me 6 update 14 looks like other then ;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin;. so that i can add the newer version.. thanks..

item.title: Java 6 update 14 (Help please)
item.dc:creator: @PoopNuggets PoopNuggets
item.description:
@PoopNuggets wrote:

dude i just said its not a compiler im having problems with.
Its setting up the java crap, With like “Path” “ClassPath”.
heres the steps i did.

  1. Downloaded java 6 update 14 (JDK)

  2. INstalled it to JRE

  3. Now i go to System variables(advanced)

  4. Then there givin me codes to edit “path” and “classpath” with.

  5. i Edit them both and put the codes the tutorials give me.

  6. And i switch the 1.6.0 to 1.6_14. or wutever.

  7. i try running my source and it says Javac cant be recognized blah blah…

                                      [size=30pt]HELP PLEASE[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Java 6 update 14 (Help please)
item.dc:creator: @lukenuke75 lukenuke75
item.description:
@lukenuke75 wrote:

[quote=“PoopNuggets, post:1, topic:285444”]ok well ive been reading some tutorials on setting up java but there thing is for ;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin;.
6 update 10 or something… but mines 6 update 14, can anyone please tell me 6 update 14 looks like other then
;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin;. so that i can add the newer version… thanks…[/quote]
just change the 1.6.0 to 1.6.0_14 on both of them tada lol

item.title: Java 6 update 14 (Help please)
item.dc:creator: @xxDiluted2xx xxDiluted2xx
item.description:
@xxDiluted2xx wrote:

What file is it? If it’s compile, put this.

@echo off
title Server Compiler
echo Compiling...
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" *.java
pause

Read full topic
